summary: A memorandum from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York scheduling an attorney conference (mitigation visit) for an inmate on August 9, 2019, at approximately 9:00 AM. The document indicates the expected presence of individuals but does not list specific names.

events.title: Scheduled Attorney Conference (Mitigation Visit)
events.description: An inmate is scheduled to meet in an attorney conference (mitigation visit) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, on or around 9:00 AM.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is a government memorandum dated August 7, 2019, from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
It schedules an attorney conference (mitigation visit) for an inmate on Friday, August 9, 2019, at approximately 9:00 AM.
The memorandum states that individuals are expected to be present but does not list any specific names.
The location is the Metropolitan Correctional Center at 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007.
The document is addressed to 'All Concerned' and replies to the attention of a Staff Attorney.
